topic.title: Steam will be blocked in China.
topic.body: I was told that Steam will be blocked in China. no idea when, maybe after 19th CPC National Congress.

topic.title: What will happen after 19th CPC National Congress in China
topic.body: Well, I am a Chinese and I live in China. Now I am Ultimately Afraid about what will happen after 19th CPC National Congress in China. Maybe massive people arrested, massive people died,  Internet disconnected, unexplainable cancer, disease , thugs killing people at no reasons...

3_1Np58q7bCfW7hmHuXvoYux3ij6M4Qecfb3.body: Well, you won't see most of Chinese on Zeronet after this November. Maybe eight years, maybe two decades, maybe forever...
Just enjoy your lives outside of the Dome.

2_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body:
> [blue0wl](#comment_1_1LTkbVdp2wW5mi6NWT9zPYuAohARFHtkBA): this is fucking atrocious

Most of Chinese people will die in two decades, in some ways, and will not let you know.
Last chance meeting guys you like living in China, they will all die after 19th CPC National Congress.

1_1HUPjBfWJgsoGfmXbkxHx999oNnP6MdUji.body:
> [chenchao](#comment_1_1CUTZH2Ld4hpmguibpRfX7cYs8xV29zNeF): 放你的屁

Just wait and see whether it's bullshit.

> [spunky](#comment_1_14Qagc7xdp5Sp58QJfvMw5nUxZwE2o8uep): 只是不能玩网路游戏？

If you can enjoy yourselves offline, whatever

> [dexzhou](#comment_1_1JhLamLn5READvTJHem7WpFVDkmXcLios7): this is not enough civilization,a gentleman will not make such comments,i beilive you never been China, and do not even have a Chinese friend.everywhere exist good and bad guys,maybe you should go home and "mom, I am hungry, i wanna suck the breast"

I've been through all of this. Every rumor has been proved to be true.

> [feofiehfwheof](#comment_1_1269EqhQMGpevRVBp3YYPoaeqtFvBguUY5): maybe that's true. "Call of duty" are already blocked in chinese steam store. it means that chinese government is watching steam for a long time. and now i can't see the store page. bullshit evil government. those evil leaders will pay for it oneday, just like Soviet Union.

FPS Games are not allowed to be sold at Taobao. Recently, Japanese games are not allowed to be sold, no reason why

> [polar](#comment_16_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6): NOW IS ALREADY BLOCKED

Just like Google. Google was blocked because of Baidu. Steam is blocked because of Tencent. Baidu did tons of bad things after Google was blocked. So it will be Tencent, right?

> [odyssey](#comment_1_1CPJqQQK9TGSE9XA5Lr8gqoKXrEX8CWckt): 这世道 墙外的谣言比墙里的谣言多到不知道哪里去了。虽然的确是墙，但是不是针对steam，而是针对给很多被墙的网站做cdn的akamai cdn。steam也用了这个所以gg了 就酱。不过akamai cdn没有完全墙，找到一组对你可用的IP就可以了。

So how to get a available one? by luck?

2_1HUPjBfWJgsoGfmXbkxHx999oNnP6MdUji.body:
> [cosmologica](#comment_33_1PiXrhT1UjMZmJc5WFhfUxourdfapeHJ8o): This congress causes a lot of stress as I understand from you. Anxiety, fear, because nobody know what will happen.

Some guys who already left , said that China will be turned into a big grave , for billions of people. I am afraid
